pyntacle.exception.multiple_solutions_error module¶

Custom Exception class inherited from ValueError to be raised when there’s more of a possible solution in a problem that doesn’t conotemplate one (e.g.: gtetting the largest component of a graph in graph_utils)

exception MultipleSolutionsError[source]¶

Bases: ValueError
